name: Grandmother's Macaroni and Cheese
author: LAURA67
summary: This is my grandmother's macaroni and cheese. It is best when cooked in a clay baking dish at 425 degrees F (220 degrees C) for 1 hour.
ingredients: 1 dash hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Bring a pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but firm to the bite, 8 minutes; drain
Stir macaroni, Cheddar cheese, milk, egg, mustard, hot pepper sauce, salt, and pepper together in a bowl; pour into a baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until brown and thickened, about 45 minutes
